Name: MYRNEscapes
About the game: Explore 4 vast, scenic landscapes with audio-reactive elements inspired by the music of MYRNE's EP 'Circles'. What Can I Do: Set amongst red sands, this world is littered with runes and artefacts of a once-powerful society. Undiscovered constellations and celestial bodies move across the sky above you as you explore, illuminating new secrets to discover. Circles: A spelunking adventure within a vast, mystical cave. Unlock and interact with the mysteries of the Circles as you make your way through an ancient cave system. Emotion: Set in a verdant, lush plateau, explore the remnants of a lost tribe as they try to tell you their stories through flickering artefacts. Relax in a stoic experience atop the cliffs; but stay away from the edges. Faithless: A dense, forested jungle is littered with bioluminescent flora, surrounding a mystic river. Cliffs and otherworldly plants keep vantage points well-hidden. Daylight cycles are extremely short, so plan your explorations wisely.
